author: brane
msg: * CHANGES: Mark as plain text.

author: gstein
msg: Flow the correct time for changed_date through the commit process. Also
fix a small bug introduced in r40172 -- we need to verify REV_DATE is not
NULL before converting it to an apr_time_t.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c:
(process_committed_leaf): switch REV_DATE param to NEW_DATE with a new
type, and pass it on to wq_add_postcommit.
(process_committed_internal): switch REV_DATE param to NEW_DATE and pass
appropriately to sub-calls.
(svn_wc_process_committed_queue, svn_wc_process_committed4): convert the
REV_DATE parameter and pass to process_commited_internal.

author: stsp
msg: * subversion/tests/cmdline/diff_tests.py
(diff_renamed_dir): Bring this XFAIL test an inch closer to XPASS.
It does a repos->wc diff expecting the semantics of the new
--show-copies-as-adds option, so if we pass that option, the test
fails a bit later (in the repos->repos diff case).

author: gstein
msg: Further tighten the scope of a log_accum variable.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c:
(remove_revert_files): remove the LOGTAGS parameter, and declare/use a
LOG_ACCUM local variable. switch LOGTAGS over to LOG_ACCUM, and write
it out before exiting the function.
(process_committed_leaf): don't worry about LOG_ACCUM, and just let
remove_revert_files() queue the right operations

author: gstein
msg: Switch the core postcommit work to a workqueue-based process, and pass all
the parameters that it needs to function properly. As a result, the call
to svn_wc__db_global_commit() now has the changed-* values which means the
(re)install into the working copy has the proper values for keyword
translation, so the trans_tests 1 can be un-XFail'd.
This revision lifts install_committed_file() and log_do_committed() from
log.c over to workqueue.c. Zero changes were made during the move.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/workqueue.h:
(svn_wc__wq_add_postcommit): new declaration
* subversion/libsvn_wc/workqueue.c:
(OP_POSTCOMMIT): new operation code
(install_committed_file, log_do_committed): moved, unchanged, from log.c
(run_postcommit): new handler to unpack the arguments from the work item
skel and call log_do_committed.
(svn_wc__wq_add_postcommit): new function to queue an OP_POSTCOMMIT
(dispatch_table): add a new handler for OP_POSTCOMMIT
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c:
(process_committed_leaf): tighten the scope of log_accum to just the
part that handles revert files. remove all the entry modification work
for changed_* and the checksum, as the commit handling will deal with
that properly (now that we pass all the right values). call the new wq
function to queue up a postcommit work item.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/log.h:
(svn_wc__loggy_committed): removed. no longer used.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/log.c:
(SVN_WC__LOG_COMMITTED, install_committed_file, log_do_committed,
svn_wc__loggy_committed): removed. no longer used.
(start_handler): remove processing for SVN_WC__LOG_COMMITTED
* subversion/tests/cmdline/trans_tests.py:
(test_list): un-XFail the 'keywords_from_birth' test
